snippet: Concerns about the effects of the Federal Reserve’s stimulus policy can dilute the policy’s impact by causing investors to doubt that rates will remain low.
abstract: Federal Reserve, seeking to reassure investors, continues to stress fact that it will not end stimulus program in the near future; Fed officials remain split about the policy and its effectiveness, and there is disagreement among those who support the stimulus about whether it could lead to inflation.
lead_paragraph: Concerns about the effects of the Federal Reserve’s stimulus policy can dilute the policy’s impact by causing investors to doubt that rates will remain low.

headline.seo: Federal Reserve, Expected to Continue Stimulus, Tries to Reassure Investors
headline.main: To Reassure Investors, Fed Stresses It Will Not End Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Fed, to Reassure Investors, Stresses It Will Not End Stimulus
